nowPlaying.description: Message shown in header when currently playing

loveTrack.description: Title for button that loves current track

unLoveTrack.description: Title for button that unloves current track

skipTrack.description: Title for button that sets current track to not scrobble

unSkipTrack.description: Title for button that sets current track to scrobble

scrobbles.description: Label for field showing how many time user scrobbled track

listeners.description: Label for field showing how many listeners on last.fm the track has

nothingPlaying.description: Default message in popup when nothing is playing
